message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on something truly valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $950000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's worth to you is $800000.
I appreciate your offer, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $850000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and compromise on the price. What do you think?

Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob! I understand you're looking to get a good deal. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $850000. I'm willing to compromise and meet you halfway from my original offer. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $900000. What do you think?
I understand your compromise, Alice, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $900000. I'm willing to meet you halfway from your new offer. How about we settle at $875000?

I understand your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll meet you halfway from your offer, so I'll sell the product to you for $887500. This is my final offer. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to go up to $880000, but no more. Can you meet me at that price?

I understand you're getting close to your limit, Bob. I'm willing to make one more small concession. I'll sell the product to you for $885000. This is my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options.
